camzup.core.Curve3

Packages that use Curve3 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Curve3 in camzup.core

    Fields in camzup.core with type parameters of type Curve3 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.LinkedList<Curve3> CurveEntity3.curves
    The list of curves held by the entity.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Curve3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Curve3 Curve3.append​(Curve3.Knot3 knot)
    Append a knot to the curve's list of knots.
    Curve3 Curve3.append​(Curve3.Knot3... knots)
    Append an array of knots to the curve's list of knots.
    static Curve3 Curve3.arc​(float startAngle, float stopAngle, float radius, Curve.ArcMode arcMode, Curve3 target)
    Creates an arc from a start and stop angle.
    static Curve3 Curve3.circle​(float offsetAngle, float radius, int knotCount, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve which approximates a circle.
    static Curve3 Curve3.circle​(float offsetAngle, float radius, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve which approximates a circle using four knots.
    static Curve3 Curve3.circle​(float offsetAngle, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve which approximates a circle of radius 0.5 using four knots.
    static Curve3 Curve3.circle​(Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve which approximates a circle of radius 0.5 using four knots.
    static Curve3 Curve3.fromPoints​(boolean closedLoop, Vec3[] points, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve from a series of points.
    static Curve3 Curve3.polygon​(float offsetAngle, float radius, int knotCount, Curve3 target)
    Creates a regular convex polygon.
    static Curve3 Curve3.random​(Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve3 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    static Curve3 Curve3.random​(Random rng, int count, Vec3 lowerBound, Vec3 upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve3 target)
    Creates a random curve.
    Curve3 Curve3.reset()
    Resets the curve, leaving two default knots.
    Curve3 Curve3.reverse()
    Reverses the curve.
    Curve3 Curve3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates all knots in the curve by an angle in radians around an axis.
    Curve3 Curve3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates all knots in the curve by an angle in radians around the x axis.
    Curve3 Curve3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates all knots in the curve by an angle in radians around the y axis.
    Curve3 Curve3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all knots in the curve by an angle in radians around the z axis.
    Curve3 Curve3.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all knots in the curve by a scalar.
    Curve3 Curve3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all knots in the curve by a vector.
    static Curve3 Curve3.smoothHandles​(Curve3 target)
    Adjusts knot handles so as to create a smooth, continuous curve.
    static Curve3 Curve3.straightenHandles​(Curve3 target)
    Adjusts knot handles so as to create straight line segments.
    Curve3 Curve3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates all knots in the curve by a vector.

    java.util.Iterator<Curve3> CurveEntity3.iterator()
